document.discussion_title: On Track Innovations Ltd. (OTIV) Lifted to “Buy” at Zacks Investment Research
document.topic_text: Zacks Investment Research upgraded shares of On Track Innovations Ltd. (NASDAQ:OTIV) from a hold rating to a buy rating in a report issued on Tuesday. They currently have $1.50 target price on the stock. According to Zacks, “On Track is a global leader in contactless microprocessor-based smart card systems. “ A hedge fund recently raised its stake in On Track Innovations stock. Renaissance Technologies LLC increased its position in On Track Innovations Ltd. (NASDAQ:OTIV) by 49.0% during the first quarter, according to its most recent filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission. The institutional investor owned 213,600 shares of the company’s stock after buying an additional 70,200 shares during the period. Renaissance Technologies LLC owned 0.52% of On Track Innovations worth $206,000 as of its most recent SEC filing. Shares of On Track Innovations ( NASDAQ:OTIV ) opened at 1.18 on Tuesday. On Track Innovations has a 12 month low of $0.32 and a 12 month high of $1.38. The company has a 50-day moving average of $1.19 and a 200-day moving average of $0.94. The stock’s market capitalization is $48.27 million. On Track Innovations (NASDAQ:OTIV) last posted its quarterly earnings results on Wednesday, August 10th. The company reported ($0.02) earnings per share for the quarter, topping the Zacks’ consensus estimate of ($0.03) by $0.01. The company had revenue of $5.10 million for the quarter, compared to analysts’ expectations of $4.39 million. On average, equities research analysts expect that On Track Innovations will post ($0.07) EPS for the current fiscal year. On Track Innovations Ltd. is a developer of cashless payment solutions. The Company’s segments include Retail and Mass Transit, Petroleum, Parking and Other. The Company offers solutions for banking, mobile network operators, vending, mass transit, petroleum and parking. The Company provides its customers with training and installation support, customer service and technical support. Get a free copy of the Zacks research report on On Track Innovations (OTIV) For more information about research offerings from Zacks Investment Research, visit Zacks.com On Track Innovations Ltd. On Track Innovations Ltd.
